Top Speed Motors is AA Dekra affiliated as well as RMI and MIWA Approved and also accredited at all major banks, Wesbank, Absa, Standard Bank, MFC and IEMAS to accommodate you with all your financial needs. Top Speed Motors delivers country wide!! Also, visit our Facebook page for daily and weekly specials and competitions. Terms and conditions apply.

attributes.title: 2016 Ford Fiesta ST 1.6 EcoBoost GDTi

attributes.description:
At WINGFIELD MOTORS our customer is king!
Before delivery, this vehicle will receive a Multi-point quality inspection before being subjected to an AA DEKRA roadworthiness test.  We will trade in any vehicle on this transaction and ensure you receive a pleasant buying experience.  Finance and Insurance can be arranged from our premises by our highly qualified and experienced staff.  You can be assured of great aftersales service, should this be required.  This vehicle can be delivered country wide at an agreed cost.  Please ask about our optional Mechanical breakdown warranties for your new vehicle.  We also provide optional Service Plans to ensure you do not experience sudden servicing costs.

attributes.description:
Seller Comments
All cars are mechanically checked and Dekra certified. Test Drives are available and welcome subject to availability. Nationwide deliveries can be arranged. We buy and will trade-in your car. On floor finance and insurance manager (NCA & FSB approved). Balance of factory warranty and/or comprehensive warranties available. Balance of motorplan on vehicles which qualify. Finance available through the majority of the financial institutions. With over 65 years of managerial retail experience, we are here to assist you through the entire vehicle purchasing process, from inquiry to delivery.
